LightningComponentBundle.description: This component allows users to leverage pre-defined data sets in the post-modern demo world

property.name: articleToDisplay
property.label: Article To Display
property.description: Select Article to display on this component. Choose 'Current Record' for Article Content record pages only, as it will display the current article from that record page.

property.name: contentSource
property.label: Content Source
property.description: Select the content source for this article. Full Article is whole text, and preview content is the abridged version. NOTE: When you use text overlay, you will only see the preview content option despite this choice.

property.name: useOnlyImage
property.label: Display Image
property.description: Choose this option to display the image from the content source.

property.name: useOnlyText
property.label: Display Text
property.description: Choose this option to display the text from the content source.

property.name: useButton
property.label: Display Button
property.description: Choose this option to display the button with the Learn More Here button

property.name: TextOverLay
property.label: Display as Text Overlay
property.description: This changes how the component looks. If you select Text overlay, it places the text overtop of the image.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Use this value to insert the value of the button you would like to display.

property.name: cssHeightOverride
property.label: CSS Image Height
property.description: This is to override the default height of the image displayed in this content article. Options are 'auto' or an integer. Do not mix numbers and letters in this string or it may result in an error in your component.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: Should be set to {!recordId} This is a required field to expose record Id in experience cloud. Basically, don't ever change this input.
